instructions.title: How to Get Started
instructions.step1: Please log in to your account with your email and password.
instructions.step2: Register your project details here or create your project details.
instructions.step3: Generate a business plan automatically, which you can download and use to generate a company logo.
instructions.step4: Generate an AI slogan, a slogan can be generated.
instructions.step5: Book an appointment for the selected project.
instructions.step6: Wait for an admin to contact you regarding your appointment and payment.
instructions.step7: Make payment for the booked project after admin confirmation.
instructions.step8: Once the appointment is booked and payment is made, access all user dashboard features.

documentation.title: Complete BizzWiz AI Guide
documentation.description: Discover all the secrets of our revolutionary AI platform. From video tutorials to answers to your most frequent questions.

faq.title: All Your
faq.description: Explore our comprehensive knowledge base to master every aspect of BizzWiz AI.
faq.startup_question1: How do I create my first project with BizzWiz AI?
faq.startup_answer1: Creating your first project is simple! Click on 'Create a Project', follow our intelligent assistant in 5 steps: describe your project, choose your services, customize your preferences, and let our AI generate your personalized roadmap. The process takes less than 10 minutes.
faq.startup_question2: What types of projects can I create?
faq.startup_answer2: BizzWiz AI supports a wide range of projects: websites, mobile applications, e-commerce, SaaS, marketplaces, blogs, portfolios, and much more. Our AI adapts to your industry and specific needs.
faq.startup_question3: How long does it take to generate a project?
faq.startup_answer3: The initial generation takes between 30 seconds and 2 minutes depending on the complexity. You will first receive an overview, then the complete details including the business plan, mockups, and technical roadmap in the following 5-10 minutes.
faq.credits_question1: How does the credit system work?
faq.credits_answer1: Each action consumes credits: project creation (5-15 credits), logo generation (3 credits), business plan (8 credits). You can track your consumption in real time and recharge when necessary. Credits never expire.
faq.credits_answer2: Absolutely no hidden fees! The displayed price includes everything: AI generation, cloud storage, customer support, and updates. You only pay for the credits you use, without forced subscription.
faq.features_question1: What is the quality of the generated results?
faq.features_answer1: Our results are professional quality, generated by AI models trained on thousands of successful projects. Each generation is unique, SEO optimized, and respects the best practices of the modern web. You can request unlimited revisions.
faq.features_question2: Can I customize the generated results?
faq.features_answer2: Yes! You can modify colors, fonts, contents, structure, and features. Our integrated editor allows real-time adjustments. For advanced modifications, our team can intervene directly.
faq.features_question3: Are the projects optimized for mobile?
faq.features_answer3: All our projects are 100% responsive and mobile-first optimized. We automatically test on all devices and browsers. You will also receive desktop, tablet, and mobile versions of your mockups.
faq.security_answer1: Maximum security guaranteed! AES-256 encryption, European servers certified GDPR, automatic backups, and restricted access. Your projects belong exclusively to you, we never share them.
faq.security_answer2: Customer support 7/7 by chat, email, and videoconference. Our team of experts responds in less than 2 hours on weekdays, 4 hours on weekends. Technical assistance, strategic advice, and training included.
faq.security_answer3: Complete export possible! Source code, assets, database, technical documentation. Supported standard formats: HTML/CSS/JS, WordPress, React, Vue. You keep 100% ownership and freedom.
faq.cta_description: Our team of experts is here to accompany you personally.
